titleStmt.title: De corpore politico, or, The elements of law, moral and politick with discourses upon severall heads, as of [brace] the law of nature, oathes and covenants, several kinds of government : with the changes and revolutions of them / by Tho. Hobbs of Malmsbury.
titleStmt.author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for J. Ridley, and are to be sold at the Castle in Fleetstreet ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of text.
